attributes.action: Deport ALL immigrants found guilty of crime, to be returned to country of origin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should not have to fund their sentences here. Let them serve it in their own countries. Our jails would have more room for our own villains, but now there are no spaces available.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
